body.content: Bianca, good to see you. Were you able to consider my offer for a meal at the inn? I'm keen to hear your thoughts on the market.

reflection: Following up on my previous invitation, I'm checking if Bianca is amenable to discussing market insights at my inn. As a calculating and advancement-seeking Facchini, securing valuable information from someone like Bianca, an Artisti with potential connections, is crucial for identifying new ventures and advancing my interests in Venice. This direct follow-up reinforces my intent to cultivate a beneficial relationship and gather intelligence without delay.
